mapper.select: select blacklist_code, user_id, user_name, blacklist_title, blacklist_content, blacklist_local, date_format(blacklist_create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') blacklist_create_date from blacklist where is_delete = 0 order by blacklist_code desc limit #{start}, #{cntPerPage}

select blacklist_code, user_id, user_name, blacklist_title, blacklist_content, blacklist_local, date_format(blacklist_create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') blacklist_create_date from blacklist where is_delete = 0 and blacklist_code = #{blacklistCode}
mapper.insert: insert into blacklist(blacklist_local, blacklist_title, user_id, user_name, blacklist_content, user_code) values(#{blacklistLocal}, #{blacklistTitle}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{blacklistContent}, #{userCode})
mapper.update: update blacklist set blacklist_local = #{blacklistLocal}, blacklist_title=#{blacklistTitle}, blacklist_content=#{blacklistContent} where blacklist_code = #{blacklistCode} and user_code = #{userCode}
update blacklist set is_delete = 1 where blacklist_code = #{blacklistCode} and user_code = #{userCode}
mapper.select: select comment_code, black_code, user_code, user_name, content, date_format(bcoment_create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') bcoment_create_date, order_code from blacklist_comment where is_delete = 0 and black_code = #{blackCode}
mapper.insert: insert into user_comment (black_code, user_code, user_name, content, order_id) values (#{blackCode},#{userCode},#{userName},#{content},#{orderId});
